resources.string: Prosím skontrolujte svoje internetové pripojenie a skúste to znova
TÁTO EMAILOVÁ ADRESA UŽ BOLA REGISTROVANÁ
PROSÍM OVERTE VAŠE ÚDAJE A SKÚSTE ZNOVU
Telefónne číslo, ktoré už bolo prijaté
Telefónne číslo, ktoré ste zadali, už bolo zaregistrované. Prosím skúste to znova
Toto konto už má heslo a e-mail adresu prepojené. Prihláste sa pomocou e-mailu.
Už sme vám poslali kód prostredníctvom SMS. Ťuknite na položku znovu odoslať po 10 minútach, aby ste dostali novú.
You can send messages up to %1$s characters long.
Prijať a odoslať fotky, udeliť povolenie na prístup k fotoaparátu
Poslali sme e-mail na \n[[%1$s]]. \nKliknite na odkaz pre overenie adresy.
E-mailovú adresa, ktorú ste zadali nie je platná. Prosím skontrolujte ju a skúste znova
Nový kód vám bol odoslaný cez SMS
Nový kód vám bol poslaný prostredníctvom e-mailu
Chcete dostávať novinky a aktualizácie produktu z Wire cez e-mail? Kedykoľvek sa môžete odhlásiť.
Súhlasím s tým, že Wire môže vytvoriť a používať anonymné dáta o používaní a chybové správy pre zlepšenie aplikácie Wire. Tento súhlas môžete kedykoľvek odvolať.
Služba nie je k dispozícii práve teraz
Používam Wire, hľadajte %1$s alebo navštívte get.wire.com

[[%1$s]] turned read receipts off for everyone

[[You]] turned read receipts off for everyone

resources.string: [[You]] were removed from this conversation because legal hold has been activated. _LEARN MORE_
Someone was removed from this conversation because legal hold has been activated. _LEARN MORE_
%1$s was removed from this conversation because legal hold has been activated. _LEARN MORE_
%1$s were removed from this conversation because legal hold has been activated. _LEARN MORE_
A message from [[%1$s]] could not be decrypted.\n _FIX TO DECRYPT FUTURE MESSAGES_
You can now decrypt future messages from [[%1$s]]. To recover lost messages, [[ask %2$s to resend them.]]\n(FIXED ERROR: [[%3$s]] ID: %4$s)
A MESSAGE FROM YOU WAS NOT RECEIVED. _WHY?_
IDENTITA ZARIADENIA [[%1$s]] BOLA ZMENENÁ. NEDORUČENÁ SPRÁVA. _ZISTIŤ VIAC_

DLHŠIE STE NEPOUŽÍVALI TOTO ZARIADENIE. NIEKTORÉ SPRÁVY SA TU NEMUSIA ZOBRAZIŤ.
PRIPOJILI SA NOVÍ ĽUDIA. OVERIŤ PRÍSTROJE

Legal hold deactivated for this conversation
Nenašla sa aplikácia na otvorenie tohto typu súboru
Sharing files with the .%1$s extension is not permitted by your organization
POLOHA SA ZOBRAZÍ NA MAPE, KEĎ BUDETE SPÄŤ ONLINE.
Ak chcete volať, ukončite svoj aktuálny hovor.
Go to Settings and allow Wire to access the microphone.
Wire doesn\'t have access to the camera
Počas hovoru sa môžu vyskytnúť problémy
VIDEO SA ZASTAVILO Z DÔVODU ZLÉHO SPOJENIA
Prijali ste hovor, ktorý nie je podporovaný touto verziou Wire.\n\nZískajte aktuálnu verziu v Play Store.
A call is active in another conversation.\nCalling here will hang up the other call.
A call is active in another conversation.\nJoining this call will hang up the other one.
You can\'t record an audio message while on a call
You can\'t record a video message while on a call
Double tap on a tile for fullscreen
Double tap to go back, pinch to zoom
The call was disconnected because someone is no longer a verified contact.
The conversation is now subject to legal hold.
Nebudete môcť odosielať ani prijímať správy v tejto konverzácii.
%1$s nebudete môcť odosielať ani prijímať správy v tejto konverzácii.
%1$s Vás nebude môcť kontaktovať, alebo Vás pozvať do skupinového rozhovoru.
This will clear the conversation history on all your devices.
This will delete the group and all content for all participants on all devices. There is no option to restore the content. All participants will be notified.
Zašleme Vám e-mail na:\n [[%1$s]]\nPoužite odkaz pre trvalé zmazanie Vášho účtu.
Zašleme Vám SMS na:\n [[%1$s]]\nPoužite odkaz pre trvalé zmazanie Vášho účtu.
Meno musí mať 2 alebo viac znakov
Send anonymous crash reports and basic data like version number and operating system to help Wire identify and solve issues in the app.

Usage data allows Wire to understand how the app is being used and how it can be improved. The data is anonymous and does not include the content of your communications (such as messages, files or calls).
Receive news and product updates from Wire via email.
Wire is locked due to inactivity
To unlock Wire, set up a passcode in your device settings.
Your organization needs to lock your app when Wire is not in use to keep the Team safe.\nCreate a memorable passcode, as it cannot be recovered.
There was a change in Wire

This makes audio calls use less data and work better on slower networks. Turn off to use constant bitrate encoding (CBR). This setting only affects 1:1 calls; conference calls always use CBR encoding.
Wire\'s contents will no longer be visible in the task switcher
Lock Wire after %1$s seconds in the background. Unlock with Pin, Pattern, Passcode or Biometrics.
The keyboard will not show suggestions when typing messages
If you don\'t recognize a device above, remove it and reset your passcode.
Wire dáva každému zariadeniu jedinečný identifikátor. Porovnajte ich a overte Vaše zariadenia a rozhovory.
Ak sa identifikátory nezhodujú, začnite novú reláciu, aby sa vygenerovali nové šifrovacie kľúče na oboch stranách.
Odstráňte toto zariadenie, ak ste ho prestali používať. Budete z neho ihneď odhlásený.
This stores troubleshooting information locally. Disabling this option will delete all local logs.
You can submit this to Wire Support to help diagnose problems.
If you experience problems with push notifications, Wire Support may ask you to reset this token.
Popíšte kroky potrebné pre reprodukovanie problému. Ak je to možné, poskytnite screenshoty a odošlite tento email.\n\n

Wire will try to keep a connection with the server open to receive notifications while the application is not in the foreground. Turning this setting off may improve battery performance, but you will no longer receive notifications when Wire is in the background. This applies to all accounts on this device.
This performs a full synchronization with the server.
Are you sure? The full synchronization may take a while.
Zadajte overovací kód, ktorý sme poslali na %s
Skontrolujte Vašu e-mailovú schránku a postupujte podľa pokynov.
Are you sure you want to remove %s from your Wire account?
Chyba pripojenia, skúste to prosím znova
When this is off, you won’t be able to see read receipts from other people. This setting does not apply to group conversations.
Wire je oveľa krajší s obrázkom.
Musíte byť online, aby ste mohli opustiť konverzáciu. Skontrolujte pripojenie a skúste to znova.
Musíte byť online, aby ste mohli odobrať ľudí z konverzácie. Skontrolujte pripojenie a skúste to znova.
Musíte byť online, aby ste mohli volať. Skontrolujte pripojenie a skúste to znova.
Notifications for all message types, including text, images, audio and video messages.
Notifications when other users ping you
Notifications about ongoing processes or secondary actions, such as calls or saving an image
This notification is necessary to keep the connection to the server alive while Wire is in the background and Google Play Services are not installed.
Nainštalujte si prosím najnovšiu verziu Wire.
Otvorte Wire a prihláste sa pre zdieľanie.
You can not share this file because this feature is disabled.
Jeden z ľudí, ktorých ste vybrali, nechce byť pridaný do konverzácií.
Niečo sa pokazilo, skúste to prosím znova.

resources.string: Vložte verifikačný kód, ktorý sme Vám poslali na \n%s
Ako by sme Vás mali volať?
ŤUKNITE NA FARBU PRE ZMENU VEĽKOSTI ŠTETCA.\n\nPOTRASTE, ABY SA ODSTRÁNILI FOTOGRAFIE.
ŤUKNITE NA FARBU PRE ZMENU VEĽKOSTI ŠTETCA.\n\nSTLAČTE A PODRŽTE PRE VYPLNENIE OBLASTI.
Nepodarilo sa získať aktuálnu umiestnenie, odmietnuté povolenia
Povoliť umiestnenie v nastavení na zobrazenie aktuálnej pozície
Služby Google Play sú potrebné pre zdieľanie umiestnenia
Do you want to allow Wire to access your location?
Odstráňte jedno z Vašich iných zariadení aby ste mohli používať Wire na tomto.
Wire dáva každému zariadeniu jedinečný identifikátor. Porovnajte ich s %1$s a overte Váš rozhovor.
%1$s používa staršiu verziu Wire. Žiadne zariadenia sa tu nezobrazujú.
Overte, že to zodpovedá identifikátoru zobrazenému na zariadení %1$s.
Je to prvýkrát čo používate Wire na tomto zariadení.
Z dôvodu ochrany osobných údajov sa tu Vaše rozhovory nezobrazia.
Obrázok sa zobrazí, keď budete opäť na Wi-Fi
Odovzdávanie veľkých súborov nie je podporované.
Naozaj chcete poslať veľký súbor cez mobilnú sieť?
Naozaj chcete odoslať %1$s cez mobilnú sieť?
Ak chcete posielať zvukové správy, udeľte povolenie na prístup k nahrávaniu zvuku.
Ťuknutím a podržaním poslať zvukovú správu
Ťuknite na položku zaznamenať správu\n Môžete ju potom _PRETVORIŤ_
Zvukové správy sú obmedzené na 25MB. Odoslať túto správu?
Read receipts were not on when this message was sent.
No one has read this message yet.
No one has liked this message yet.
Získajte Vaše jedinečné meno vo Wire. _Zistiť viac._
You will appear as Away to other people. You will not receive notifications about any incoming calls or messages.
You will appear as Busy to other people. You will only receive notifications for mentions, replies, and calls in conversations that are not muted.
You will appear as Available to other people. You will receive notifications for incoming calls and for messages according to the Notifications setting in each conversation.
You will receive notifications for incoming calls and for messages according to the Notifications setting in each conversation.
Do not display this information again
Status affects notifications now. You\'re set to \"Away\" and won\'t receive any notifications.
Status affects notifications now. You\'re set to \"Busy\" and will only receive notifications when someone mentions you or replies to one of your messages.
You have connected a device to your Wire account
Ak ste to neboli Vy, odpojte zariadenie a zmeňte si heslo.
You can always change it later.
Enter the verification code we sent to %1$s.
Chat privately with groups of friends and family
Secure collaboration for businesses, institutions and professional organizations
Notifications may include alerts, sounds, and icon badges. These can be configured in Settings.
Enter the company SSO access code.
THE MAXIMUM NUMBER OF INVITATIONS HAS BEEN SENT
SOMETHING WENT WRONG, PLEASE TRY AGAIN
THIS EMAIL ADDRESS IS ALREADY IN USE
Your Wire team is ready to go. Invite your colleagues as members.
Services are helpers that can improve your workflow. To enable them, ask your administrator.
Services are helpers that can improve your workflow.
Open this conversation to services and people outside your team.
When this is on, people can see when their messages in this conversation are read.
If both sides turn on read receipts, you can see when messages are read.
You can change this option in your account settings.
When this is on, the admin can add or remove people and services, update group settings, and change a participant’s role.
Open this conversation to services and people outside your team.
Self-deleting messages will be turned on for all the participants in this conversation
You can be notified about everything (including audio and video calls) or only when you are mentioned.
Could not allow guests nor services. Please try again.
Current guests and services will be removed from the conversation. New guests and services will not be allowed.
Anyone with the link can join the conversation, even if they don\'t have Wire
New guests will not be able to join with this link. Current guests will still have access.
People outside your team can join this conversation.
Create a backup to preserve your conversation history. You can use this to restore history if you lose your device or switch to a new one. \n\nChoose a strong password to protect the backup file.
The backup will be compressed and encrypted with a password. Make sure to store it in a secure place.
You need an email address and a password to use Wire on multiple devices.
Enter the password for your Wire account.\n%1$s
You\'ve used Wire on this device before.
If that was long ago, some messages may not appear here.
The backup contents will replace the conversation history on this device. You can only restore history from a backup of the same platform.
You need an email and a password in order to back up your conversation history. You can do it from the account page in Settings.
The file could not be saved
You may not have enough space or permission to save it there.
Your history could not be restored.
This backup was created by a newer or outdated version of Wire and cannot be restored here.
You cannot restore history from a different account.
Up to %1$s people can join a group conversation.
Up to %1$s people can join a conversation.
Up to %1$s people can join a conversation. Currently there is only room for %2$s more.
Please contact your team administrator for details (Error %1$s).
This email cannot be used for enterprise login. Please enter the SSO code to proceed.
Prosím zadajte platnú e-mail adresu alebo SSO prístupový kód.
Please enter a valid SSO access code.
This email is linked to a different server, but the app can only be connected to one server at a time. Please log out of all Wire accounts on this device and try to log in again.
Please verify your company SSO access code and try again.
You can only be logged in with two accounts at once. Log out from one to add another.
Services have access to the content of this conversation
Find people in Wire by name or @username
Find people from another domain by @username@domainname
The link you opened is not valid.
Pravdepodobne nemáte povolenie s týmto účtom alebo osoba nemusí byť na Wire.
Pravdepodobne nemáte povolenie s týmto účtom, alebo účet už neexistuje.
Use at least %1$s characters, with one lowercase letter, one capital letter, a number, and a special character.
This action will connect the app to a custom server: %1$s
You are connected to a third-party server: \"%1$s\"
Please check your internet connection, verify the link and try again.
We can\'t connect to the server at %1$s.\nLet your server administrator know about this issue.
You are already logged in.\nTo connect to this server, log out of all accounts and try again.
You can not use Wire on this device.
You can change this option in your account settings.
Allow Wire to make your device more secure.
Wire needs admin privileges to set security policies.
Your device must have a password with minimum %1$s characters, at least one each of digit, uppercase, lowercase, and special symbol.
The application did not communicate with the server for a long period of time, or your session has been remotely invalidated.
Create a new folder by pressing the + button
Move the conversation \"%1$s\" to a new folder.
An error occurred while trying to delete the group. Please try again.
An error occurred while trying to delete the group %1$s. Please try again.
Prosím skontrolujte svoje internetové pripojenie a skúste to znova
Please enter your email or SSO code. If your email matches an enterprise installation of Wire, this app will connect to that server.
Niečo sa pokazilo, skúste to prosím znova.
Are you sure you want to remove %s from your Wire account?
We will send an email to:\n %1$s \nFollow the link to permanently delete your account.
We will send an SMS to:\n %1$s \nFollow the link to permanently delete your account.
Account deletion confirmed, please check your email.
This email address is not allowed.
This email address you used is already linked to an account.\nUse another email address or try to login if you own this account.
This phone number is not allowed.
This phone number you used is already linked to an account.\nUse another phone number or try to login if you own this account.
Zadajte overovací kód, ktorý sme poslali na %s
Enter the code we sent to %s
The given e-mail address is in use.
The given phone number is in use.
Your answer can\'t be sent, please retry.
You are being redirected to your dedicated enterprise service.
Provide credentials only if you\'re sure this is your organization\'s login.

Legal Hold has been activated for your account.

All Messages will be preserved for future access, including deleted, edited, and self-deleting messages.

Your conversation partners will be aware of the recording.
Legal Hold has been activated for at least one person in this conversation.\n\nAll Messages will be preserved for future access, including deleted, edited, and self-deleting messages.
All future messages will be recorded by the device with fingerprint:\n%1$sThis includes deleted, edited and self-deleting messages in all conversations.
All future messages will be recorded by the device with fingerprint:\n%1$sThis includes deleted, edited and self-deleting messages in all conversations.\nEnter your password to confirm.
Future messages will not be recorded.
Due to legal hold, only team members can be added to this conversation.
This user is blocked due to legal hold. _LEARN MORE_
You cannot connect to this user due to legal hold.
You have been invited to a conversation:\n%s
You could not join the conversation
There has been a change in Wire
Sharing and receiving files of any type is now enabled.
Sharing and receiving files of any type is now disabled.
Sending of self deleting messages is enabled.
Sending of self deleting messages is mandatory. The enforced timeout for deletion is %s seconds.
Sending of self deleting messages is disabled.

Your team is currently on the free Basic plan. Upgrade to Enterprise for access to features such as starting conferences and more.
Learn more about Wire\'s pricing

Your team was upgraded to Wire Enterprise, which gives you access to features such as conference calls and more.
Learn more about Wire Enterprise
The option to initiate a conference call is only available in the paid version of Wire.
To start a conference call, your team needs to upgrade to the Enterprise plan.
